body.name: Ultenic U12 Vesla Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 450W 30Kpa Powerful Stick Vacuum with Car Dashboard Like Screen, Tangle-Free Brush for Pet Hair, Tools for Hard Floor, Carpet, Car Cleaning
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 18 mins
features: 2023 Ultimate Vacuum Design: Do you know your home is filled with invisible dust in every corner, cabinet, and even on seemingly clean floors? Don't worry, with the Ultenic U12 Vesla cordless vacuum, you can easily pick up all of it, and enjoy the freedom of barefoot at home. Equipped with green LED headlights, even the tiniest dust and particles have nowhere to hide. While the dashboard-inspired screen design adds a fun touch to your daily cleaning routine

High-Powered Cleaning: Say goodbye to dust, hair, and particles with the cordless vacuum cleaner. Equipped with a 450W high-speed motor, the stick vacuum generates an impressive 30Kpa suction power for an effortless cleaning experience. Perfect for both hard floors and carpets, it tackles even the toughest messes with ease

Tangle-Free Roller Brush: The Ultenic U12 Vesla stick vacuum features an anti-tangle brush that can easily pick up long hair and pet hair without getting tangled. No more annoying hair clogs or stopping to untangle the brush

More Cleaning Options: The stick vacuum cleaner also comes with a crevice brush and a combination tool, so you can switch it to a handheld vacuum in seconds to clean couches, cars, stairs, and upholstery. The telescopic pipe allows you to adjust the length of it as you need, so you can pick up the dust on hard-to-reach ceilings and ceiling fans

Thorough Cleaning with No Interruption: The powerful cordless vacuum cleaner features a removable battery, so you can charge it anywhere in your home. With a battery life of up to 45 minutes on a single charge(In ECO mode, measured at the hand vacuum), it can tackle your entire home without interruption. The large 0.26gal dust cup ensures that you won't have to empty it again and again

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Car Dashboard Like Screen Ultimate Visual With a dashboard design inspired by high-end sports cars, it makes cleaning a thrilling race Tangle-Free Roller Brush Farewell to Hair Wrap Tackle pet hair effortlessly with our specialized tangle-free roller brush. Next page 1 Dashboard Design 2 Tangle-Free Brush

30,000Pa Ultra-Powerful The advanced 450-watt digital motor packs a serious punch, delivering powerful and consistent suction that knocks out even the toughest dirt and debris. Ultimate Maneuverability An ergonomic design that could be extended or contracted to various lengths depending on your cleaning needs. 180° to Ground, Lightweight and Effortless Features a swivel steering design for easy maneuverability and perfect for quick cleanups.

Previous page Combination Tool With soft nylon bristles to clean delicate surfaces and fabrics. Wall Mount Space-saving and useful for keeping the vacuum's attachments organized and easily accessible. Next page 1 Crevice Tool 2 Combination Tool 3 Detachable Battery 4 Wall Mount

One Press Start User-friendly design to start the vacuum with a single click and without having to hold down the trigger. 0.26 Gallon High-Capacity Save time and effort with our upgraded large capacity dustbin. Easy Maintenance The secret to a clean home? Easy maintenance cleaning gadgets!

How much does the product weigh？ It depeneds on the attachments that you use on your vacuum, the whole unit can weigh up to 4.39 lbs or 1.94 kg，which is euqal to 64 fl oz milk. What is the voltage of the charger? It uses 100-240V in its charger. What is included in the box? The package comes with a main body of the U12 Vesla stick vacuum,a crevice tool, a combination tool,a charger, a wall mount and one extra HEPA filter. How often should I wash the filter? Assuming that you’re vacuuming your house once to twice a week, you should clean your vacuum filter once every two months. You may need to clean it more frequently, up to once a month, if you’re using your vacuum more often. How do I know when the filters need to be cleaned? The filters should be cleaned when you feel that the machine has reduced suction or when the air duct blockage warning lamp is red. Please make sure to replace your vacuum filter every 3–6 months depending on usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually really great
reviews.reviewText: We got this vacuum on Prime Day, but was a little unsure about it because it's so much less expensive than other bigger name stick vacuums.I'm actually really impressed with it! It is super lightweight, but doesn't feel cheap. We have left it propped up from time to time and it has fallen over a few times because we have young kids and pets and things get a little chaotic at times. It's held up really well to those drops without anything cracking or becoming dislodged.We have super thick plush carpet in the bedrooms and it works really well on those floors. I was worried about that somewhat because out upright vacuum struggles on that carpet, but the stick one does fine. I love how you can choose the level of suction you want. I use the lowest or second lowest section for the hard floors, and then the highest or medium level for the carpets and rugs. Super easy to switch between levels.I have a love hate relationship with the green light because it almost does too good of a job showing me all the spots that need vacuuming, haha. I can't believe how much dog and cat hair collects in a day or even just a few hours. But the light really is useful for letting me catch it all. We used to sweep every night but now we vacuum and my husband feels like we have had less dust in general and I have to agree. It's faster than sweeping and we're not kicking dust up all over the place so overall a great alternative.The battery charge has been great too. I've never run the battery all the way down, even though I use it all the time. It's easy enough to just plug it back in a grab it again when you need it. The display shows how much battery is left and it adjusts depending on what level suction you are using. It came with a mount, but we've been too lazy to install it so far.The dust buster feature is great too and I use that all the time to get things in the nooks and crannies or behind things when I'm vacuuming and can't get it that way. I just carry the attachment with me and switch it out really quickly, dust bust behind whatever it and, and then switch it back.Overall I'm super happy with this purchase. It may not be as great as something like a Dyson (I don't know though because I've never used one), but it gets the job done and that's all I need it to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So very much to like about this vacuum cleaner
reviews.reviewText: There is so much to like about this cordless vacuum cleaner…lightweight; the roller does not collect much hair, if any; the LED light to see where dirt and dust is hiding; so very quiet that it doesn’t terrify our cat when in operation; easy to clean; easy to store; maneuvers easily in tight spaces; excellent suction with multiple levels of operation; battery life is sufficient for vacuuming my 2,000 sq. ft. home; the display is informative; priced lower than its competitors but works as well if not better than the top brands. Takes about 4 hours to recharge, but I have bought a spare battery just in case I run out of battery life. The attachments are easy to install and are helpful. The cordless vacuum experience is so much better than a corded experience.I have heard from many of my friends who have bought the more expensive Dyson equivalent that they only got about 7 months of use before it failed…pretty consistent in the failure rate. I am hoping that by offering a 2 and 3 year protection plan that Ultenic is confident in the durability of their product.I can unequivocally say that this has been the best vacuum experience that I have had in the several decades that I have been vacuuming floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing stick vacuum for the price, very effective
reviews.reviewText: I used have a dyson for my hard floors and it went bad so needed a good stick vacuum but did not want to pay six hundred plus for a stick vac. I came across this one and decided to try it.Since its arrival have now used it daily for about 2 weeks now! Yes we vacuum our living and kitchen space daily! I must say I am impressed, very impressed.The packaging is very modern and it was very packed, great for gifting since the box is very modern looking too! But the key measure for us was how well it cleans and I am happy to say that it totally compares to my old dyson V8 and less than one third the price.The green light at the bottom is a blessing, you can actaully see the dust and debris very clearly… so you will not miss any corner or space!I felt this is a little quieter as well, and has so many speed options!Emptying the dust is a click of a button, the battery life is super amazing and this one lasts us so much more! Picks up all the stuff right from minute dust particles to kids messes of cereal or dry food spills.One hand operation, smooth maneuverability, powerful suction, amazing battery life and more advanced than my previous vacuum for less than one third the price… what else could I ask for?Highly recommend this product! Totally works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great vacuum for a smaller house
reviews.reviewText: Powerful, sturdy and easy-to-manouver vacuum. This vacuum has made cleaning my apartment floors so much easier! No cords to mess with and it is super light. The only drawback is that battery life is around 30 minutes tops on the lower power settings — not really a problem for me, but could be an issue for a larger house or if you’re wanting to vacuum a carpeted house on maximum power. Def recommend if you’re looking to upgrade from an traditional vacuum.

reviews.reviewTitle: Aspirador-escoba con buena potencia y fácil manejo, funciona muy bien
reviews.reviewText: Va muy suave, aspira genial, tiene potencia, incluso en el modo más flojo. No ocupa nada, la luz es verde, una maravilla para ver todas las partículas de polvo, y los pelosBuscaba sencillez y a la vez funcionalidad y desde luego que este aspirador cumple mis expectativas.de momento todo correcto, aunque es nuevo,Recomendable.

reviews.reviewerName: ★ Goldjunge ★ Da ★ DeNg ★ DeNG ★★ Goldjunge ★ Da ★ DeNg ★ DeNG ★
reviews.reviewText: 🤩Handlichkeit/Gewicht🤩Der Ultenic U12 Akkusauger ist äußerst handlich und leicht. Das geringe Gewicht macht es mühelos, das Gerät zu tragen und auch schwer erreichbare Stellen zu reinigen. Die kompakte Bauweise ermöglicht es mir, den Sauger problemlos zu verstauen, ohne viel Platz in Anspruch zu nehmen. Die Handhabung ist insgesamt sehr komfortabel.🤩Saugleistung🤩Die Saugleistung des Ultenic U12 ist beeindruckend. Egal ob auf Hartböden oder Teppichen, der Sauger entfernt Schmutz, Staub und Haare mühelos. Sogar Tierhaare werden gründlich beseitigt. Die verschiedenen Aufsätze ermöglichen es mir, auch in Ecken und an schwer zugänglichen Stellen gründlich zu reinigen. Die Akkulaufzeit ist zudem ausreichend lang, um größere Flächen ohne Unterbrechung zu saugen.🤩Touchpanel🤩Das Touchpanel des Ultenic U12 ist eine praktische Funktion, die die Bedienung des Saugers erleichtert. Mit nur einem Fingertipp kann ich zwischen den verschiedenen Saugmodi wechseln und anpassen. Die Bedienung ist intuitiv und unkompliziert.Fazit:Insgesamt bin ich äußerst zufrieden mit dem Ultenic U12 Akkusauger. Die Kombination aus Handlichkeit, leistungsstarker Saugleistung und praktischem Touchpanel macht ihn zu einem großartigen Haushaltshelfer.❎ ❎ ❎ FAZIT ❎ ❎ ❎🤩 5 STERNE 🤩 🤩 ★★★★★ 🤩 🤩 Ξx⊂ΞLLΞ∩T 🤩🙂 Danke für das Lesen meiner Rezension. Hoffentlich konnte ich dir damit helfen 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This wireless vacuum is fantastic. It delivers impressive suction power along with an excellent battery life. It's incredibly lightweight and user-friendly. I particularly appreciate the vibrant green light feature, which not only aids in spotting dust on the floor but helps quicken the cleaning process! The assortment of accessories that come with it is fantastic, making it versatile enough for car cleaning.The vacuum provides three unique modes designed for diverse cleaning tasks, addressing different surfaces and types of debris.The vacuum is furnished with a screen that offers valuable details regarding the battery charge duration for each mode.The product arrived well packaged, complete with essential accessories. Included are extra filters, attachments, and an extendable handle. The detachable battery is a convenient feature, and users can purchase additional ones for extended cleaning sessions.In Conclusion, a very good piece of vacuum, great battery life, good performance and lightweight make this highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottimo acquisto ad un ottimo prezzo
reviews.reviewText: Mi decido ad acquistare questo marchio, a dire il vero per me sconosciuto, fidandomi del mio istinto, delle caratteristiche tecniche e perché no, della possibilità di rendere il prodotto senza problemi. Con vera gioia, posso assicurarvi un prodotto eccellente: aspirazione potente, maneggevole, ricarica veloce, molto bella anche come design, tecnologicamente all'avanguardia, facile da pulire....la luce verde poi è fantastica, non sfugge un granello!!! insomma, veramente soddisfatta del mio acquisto ad un ottimo prezzo, sproporzionato alla performance direi, vale sicuramente molto di più; sul mercato allo stesso prezzo trovi aspirabriciole a bassa potenza.

The media could not be loaded. Je suis tombé sur une pépite avec l'aspirateur robot Ultenic U12. Je suis extrêmement satisfait car il coche toutes les cases importantes que l'on peut espérer d'un robot aspirateur et possède en plus des fonctionnalités supplémentaires.Voici ce que j'ai découvert dans la boîte de l'aspirateur ultenic U12 :➡️ Une Aspirateur Tête de moteur➡️ Une brosse rotative anti-emmêlement➡️ Une Brosse polyvalent➡️ Un Tube d’extension➡️ Une Brosse suceur➡️ Un Réservoir à poussière 1L➡️ Un Support mural➡️ Un adaptateur➡️ Une batterie➡️ Un filtre HEPA➡️ Manuel Multilangue✅ Le design est vraiment pas mal du tout, la couleur varie du gris au gris sombre et il est très minimaliste. Il est fait en plastique mais un plastique de bonne qualité. Il devrait durer dans le temps.✅ La perche télescopique s'ajuste facilement , il s'ajuste et se règle à toute les tailles. La conception pivotante de la tête de brosse est vraiment bien, ca s'adapte bien et permet une utilisation efficace sur toutes les surfaces. Je n'ai plus besoin de déplacer mon fauteuil et mes meubles à chaque fois comme avec mon ancien aspirateur, car elle prend en charge les angles plats à 180°. Personnellement, je l'utilise également pour nettoyer ma voiture, il y a une Lampe de Poche Intégrée qui éclaire les zones sombres et ca met vraiment utile pour nettoyer à tous les coins et recoins, ce qui me permet de faire un nettoyage optimal. Les bords, les crevasses, les meubles et les radiateurs ne seront plus un problème.✅ L'Ultenic U12 possède une puissance d'aspiration de 30000Pa. J'avais des soucis récurrents avec des saletés qui s'incrustaient sur le coussin de mon chien, et je devais les retirer à la main à chaque fois, ce qui était fastidieux. Avec le U12 j’arrive à les effacer efficacement.✅ L'aspirateur sans fil Ultenic U12 est doté d'une batterie longue durée pouvant durer jusqu'à 45 minutes, ce qui laisse largement le tempS d'aspirer toute ce que l'on veut. Ainsi, même les grandes maisons peuvent être nettoyées sans interruption avec un résultat impeccable.✅ Je ne sais pas exactement comment ca fonctionne mais grace au système de lumière LED verte j'arrive à voir beaucoup mieux les poussières et à les aspirer , apparement la Technologie GreenEye permet de voir les poussières microscopique.❌ Le bruit de l'aspirateur peut être un peu gênant lorsqu'il est en mode aspiration maximal, mais cela reste raisonnable.En conclusion, je le recommande vivement pour toutes les fonctionnalités qu'il propose, ainsi que pour sa puissance d'aspiration et son autonomie. C'est franchement le choix idéal si vous voulez maintenir votre maison propre et impeccable Pour pas cher
